pages.text: Ars Nouveau 1.3.0, Item Filtering! $(li)Now adds Item Scroll: Allow and Item Scroll: Deny, which may be given to Carbuncles to filter the items they pickup!$(li)Improves Carbuncle pathing around double chests$(li)Fixes bugs with the Dominion Wand becoming broken$(li)Adds missing whelp info on world save$(li)Runes should no longer crash loop you.
$(li)Fixes projectiles not visually warping.$(li)Documentation for the Carbuncle and Dominion Wand has been updated.$(li)Fixes held items disappearing when dispelling a carbuncle.
